## WsServer class

WebSocket Server implementation using template method pattern 继承BaseServer，只实现WebSocket特定的逻辑

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare class WsServer extends BaseServer<WebSocketServerOptions> 
```
**Extends:** BaseServer&lt;WebSocketServerOptions&gt;
